dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A high-tech exhibition in Thessaloniki, but wait, it's actually at the Athens Hilton? That's a bit of a location switch, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A high-tech exhibition in Thessaloniki, but wait, it's actually at the Athens Hilton? That's a bit of a location switch, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens. It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that caught my eye too—Reconnect is organized by the Greek Ministry of Tourism, but hosted by Alpha Industries. It's running from October 28th to November 1st.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that caught my eye too-Reconnect is organized by the Greek Ministry of Tourism, but hosted by Alpha Industries. It's running from October twenty eighth to November first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens. It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's bringing together all the big names in textiles globally—manufacturers, retailers, even fashion folks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's bringing together all the big names in textiles globally-manufacturers, retailers, even fashion folks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All the key players of the electronics industry from all around Greece and abroad will be present.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're doing something pretty unique with these networking sessions and a silent auction for companies to showcase their portfolios.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're doing something pretty unique with these networking sessions and a silent auction for companies to showcase their portfolios.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For three days, in the specially designed spaces of Grand Resort Lagonissi, the participants will have the opportunity to use the CEO Lounge and network through a series of live sessions and activities - such as 90' to impress where each company will present its portfolio and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I love that idea—like, mixing business with these interactive elements. And then they've got these tailor-made rental spaces for each participant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I love that idea-like, mixing business with these interactive elements. And then they've got these tailor-made rental spaces for each participant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All these will take place during the exhibition in the specially designed and state-of-the-art booths that are tailor-made to the needs of each participant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But it doesn't end there—afterwards, there's a gala dinner and concert at the Acropolis Museum, which sounds absolutely stunning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it doesn't end there-afterwards, there's a gala dinner and concert at the Acropolis Museum, which sounds absolutely stunning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're having different musicians each night, Greek and international, to kind of blend business with some real cultural immersion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're having different musicians each night, Greek and international, to kind of blend business with some real cultural immersion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Greek and non-Greek designers, a different one every night, will present their creations and carry us away to a unique experience that combines business and pleasure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's like they're reimagining what a trade show can be—not just booths and handshakes, but a whole experience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like they're reimagining what a trade show can be-not just booths and handshakes, but a whole experience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the sponsor list is massive—I mean, Alpha Industries is hosting, but look at all those international companies backing it up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the sponsor list is massive-I mean, Alpha Industries is hosting, but look at all those international companies backing it up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect, hosted by Z Empire, offers a new experience to both exhibitors and visitors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure—AB GSMSHOP.AT GMBH, ALAZNE INTERNATIONAL, BLESSINGS TELECOM… it's a who's who of global business.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure-A B the website G M B H, A L A Z N E INTERNATIONAL, BLESSINGS T E L E C O M... it's a who's who of global business.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Sponsors: AB GSMSHOP.AT GMBH, ALAZNE INTERNATIONAL COMPANY LIMITED, BLESSINGS TELECOM FZE, BM ELECTRONICS FZCO, BOMBAY BAZAAR, Bugaz Ekotrade s.r.o., CASK BVBA, Central point Europe s.r.o., CIL INTERNATIONAL DMCC, CPU Global Sales S.L., DALTON TRADE B.V., DESA S.R.L, ERREGAME S.P.A., ETHOSCORP DWC LLC, EUROMEDIA INVESTMENT GROUP S.L., Fast Track Pte Ltd, FIRE BIRD DISTRIBUTION FZE, GERAR TRADING S.R.O, GLOBAL AND EAGLE S.L.U., GOtel GmbH, Instant Solution Ltd, INTERCOMM TRADING AG, Interken Freighters (UK) Ltd, J and D GOLDEN UNION ENTERPRISES LTD, KRISHNA WIRELESS LLC, KHALID LEMAR, LOGIX ONE FZE, METROPOLITAN TRENDS GMBH, MICROTEC B.V., MOBILSHOP GMBH, MOBIPARTS SRL, NOMIKOS FINANCIAL SERVICES LTD, Parktel Sp. z o.o., QANGER LIMITED, RIBA MUNDO TECNOLOGIA SL, RICH BAY INTERNATIONAL TRADING LTD, RS Global Ltd, S.C RAINBOW INTERNATIONAL DISTRIBUTION, SELTE S.P.A., SG S.P.A., SK AND ASSOCIATES LTD,, SOUND BUSINESS SARL, TELEPART DISTRIBUTION GMBH,TINEX GmbH, VADIMPEX BADEN, VIRTUAL ZONE LLC, Foxbox.gr, Yukatel GmbH, ZOOM ME GLOBAL FZ-LLC, Electroholic.gr UNICOM TELECOM FZE, Alltech, Prime , Accessmarket.nl and ZOE TRADE TICKETS.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, events like this could really set a new standard—combining networking, luxury, and local culture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, events like this could really set a new standard-combining networking, luxury, and local culture.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Though I have to say, calling it "many should miss" in the text might be a typo—probably meant "shouldn't miss," right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Though I have to say, calling it many should miss in the text might be a typo-probably meant shouldn't miss, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is a truly unique event that no one should miss.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, definitely a slip-up. But honestly, with everything they're offering, it does sound like an event you wouldn't want to skip.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, definitely a slip-up. But honestly, with everything they're offering, it does sound like an event you wouldn't want to skip.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For three days of innovation and then a night at the Acropolis? Sign me up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For three days of innovation and then a night at the Acropolis? Sign me up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.
